ai-patthana21.7:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.7:1.1_0: no unskillful quality doesn’t give rise to skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.7:1.1_1: or unskillful qualities are not a condition for the skillful.
ai-patthana21.7:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.7:2.1_0: or excessive teaching, unskillful qualities arise because of an unwholesome mind.
ai-patthana21.7:3.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana21.7:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
